title: 关于1.9指令（详细见内）
author: xiaoyuan233
txt_content:
求1.9点击对话触发指令的指令 原来的
tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"【",clickEvent:run_command,value:""}}]}
为什么说错误？
求正确指令

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
tellraw @a {"text":"文字","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"[需执行命令]"}}

好久没用/tellraw，现在记不太清了……

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
tellraw @a {"text":"","extra":[{"text":"【","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":""}}]}
1.9+所有json都要加上""，还有action哪去了
